page.title: 02F.C. DEPOT SANTON DOWNHAM
page.content: The Depot has a Forest District Manager, three Line Managers who are senior Foresters responsible for Marketing, Forest Management and the Brandon Depot. There are also 21 Foresters, 180 industrial staff, a deputy, office staff, Land Agent, Work Study and Training teams. One of the most important aspects is the 19 polythene houses where over 2m Corsican pine seedlings are raised annually. Stock for planting is ready after 18 weeks plus a hardening period. The seedlings are planted by a modified Finn machine and it only needs 2 teams of 2 men to cope with the whole re_planting programme. Co_operation with the Nature Conservancy Council and similar groups is intended to maintain and improve the Forest for wildlife and humans.
